theme.title: Syncopation (5)
theme.para: In this lesson a new rhythmic pattern is introduced: One 8th note tied to group of one 8th and two 16th notes. Note that this new pattern can be written in two different ways:

score.music: (Metrica 2 4)(n a4 c g+)(n a4 c l g-)(n a4 c g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 s g-)(Barra Doble)) (c (n a4 c)(n a4 n)(n a4 s g+)(n a4 s g-)(Barra Final))

part.title: Lesson and note the differences
part.para: Lesson each measure and note how the new introduced pattern appears:

score.music: (Metrica 2 4)(n a4 n)(n a4 c g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 s g-) ) (c (n a4 c g+)(n a4 c g-)(n a4 c g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 s g-) ) (c (n a4 c g+)(n a4 c l g-)(n a4 c g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 s g-)(Barra Final))

part.title: Exercises
part.para: Exercise 1 - Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.
Exercise 2 - Read scores containing the rhythms studied in this lesson.
